## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 25,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         |  To ensure sufficient stock to cover the forecasted demand for the next five days, factoring in a 10% margin of error for demand variability. This order size also allows for efficient utilization of vendor order quantities (2 x 12,500 units) and leverages the discount threshold. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The recommended order size is 5,000 units higher than the player's planned order, which ensures a higher level of stock coverage for potential demand fluctuations. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2.14 days                                |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5.25 days                                |
| Comments                          |  By adjusting the order size, we can better match the forecasted demand, reduce the risk of stockouts, and maintain an optimal inventory turnover rate. This approach ensures that enough stock is available to meet sales demand while avoiding excess inventory. |
